issue.title: [Python][Packaging] Use numpy 1.21.3 to build python 3.10 wheels for macOS and windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14410](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14410). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
